org.apache.reef.driver

Interface PreemptionHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventHandler<PreemptionEvent>

    public interface PreemptionHandler
extends EventHandler<PreemptionEvent>
    This EventHandler will receive preemption events from the underlying resourcemanager. NOTE: This currently not implemented. Consider it a preview of the API.
